column4: hello again - i'm trying to play DVDs and i've downloaded VLC and the vlc-plugin-esd and mozilla-plugin-vlc...
still, i got this msg from VLC when i tried to run the DVD: Your input can't be opened: VLC is unable to open the MRL 'dvd:///dev/sr0'. Check the log for details.
... anyone knows what the issue is?
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
